name: PurpleBlue
description:
This is from further explorations/experimentation with GLSL. Hexagonal patterns with subtle mutation and a global warping. Regular shifting in faux lighting and all of this loops perfectly after 8 seconds thanx to mathematics. Noisified while rendering in a 16-bit-console-based graphics device. Stucki-style dithering applied and contrast boosted. 

GIF
320x320
160 frames, 20fps

by @ecomfort_arts
December 2021
